citeinfo.title: Plant community extent along monitoring transects for Disney Wilderness Preserve, Florida
Consequences and Correlates of Fire in Wetlands -- JFSP 01-1-3-09 {43FDCF46-8CA2-4FF6-8561-1DF571136A95}

descript.abstract: Distance along transects of various communities; characterizations were done for 1993-1995 and 1999-2000
descript.purpose: To help characterize monitoring locations and change in community extent over time
descript.supplinf: The Disney Wilderness Preserve (DWP) in Osceola and Polk counties, Florida. Approximate bounding coordinates N: Lat 28.145 Long -81.439; S: Lat 28.029 Long -81.406; E: Lat 28.074 Long -81.373; W: Lat 28.129 Long -81.457

spdom.descgeog: Disney Wilderness Preserve in Osceola and Polk counties, Florida

idinfo.accconst: Requests for data should be directed to the DWP Research Coordinator. Data will be provided in electronic format.
idinfo.useconst: Any reports or publications presenting or referring to these datasets must be approved by the DWP Research Coordinator prior to publication. Proper credit must be given to DWP and The Nature Conservancy.

cntinfo.cntinst: DWP Research Coordinator. As of 5/19/05, this is Sandy Woiak.

idinfo.native: Microsoft Windows XP Version 5.1 (Build 2600) Service Pack 2; ESRI ArcCatalog 9.0.0.535

citeinfo.title: Consequences and Correlates of Fire in Wetlands -- JFSP 01-1-3-09 {43FDCF46-8CA2-4FF6-8561-1DF571136A95}

distinfo.resdesc: Requests for data should be directed to the DWP Research Coordinator. Data will be provided in electronic format.
distinfo.distliab: No warranty expressed or implied is made regarding the accuracy or utility of the data for general or scientific purposes, nor shall the act of distribution constitute any such warranty. This disclaimer applies both to individual use of the data and aggregate use with other data. It is strongly recommended that these data are directly acquired from the originator(s) of the data, and not indirectly through other sources which may have changed the data in some way. It is also strongly recommended that careful attention be paid to the contents of the metadata file associated with these data.
